Note that the `for (;;) {` loop is an infinite loop, and the `while (goto w) {` loop is also an infinite loop because it is using a `goto` statement to jump back to the start of the loop.

2. The second loop is a while loop with no condition, which means it will run indefinitely. This loop is located in the `fn1` function, and it is used to repeatedly jump to the label `w`.
